header.p: Jmol.js is a JavaScript library that can be used to simplify development of web pages that include the JmolApplet. It automates the generation of many HTML tag sequences, thereby making the code simpler, easier to understand, and less error-prone.

section.title: Sample HTML page using Jmol.js
jmolButton
section.p: Draws a button with a text label. If label is not specified it defaults to the first 32 chars of the script. script is run when the button is pressed.
